players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, if you are the detective, who did you investigate last night?"
Charlie: "I was investigating Bob last night and he seemed suspicious."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he was the mafia."
Charlie: "your message"
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He lied about investigating me. Alice was killed by mafia. Vote Charlie."
Diana: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.

Diana: "Bob, if you are the detective, who did you investigate last night?"

Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he was the mafia."
You: "your message"
Bob: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He lied about investigating me. Alice was killed by mafia. Vote Charlie."
Diana: remained silent.
